title: Teuthrone
description: An unexcavated ancient port settlement on the Gulf of Lakonia, located near modern Kotronas. There is some evidence of Bronze Age habitation on the Skopa peninsula and reports of a significant Classical-to-Roman complex on the mainland in the vicinity.

properties.description: 1:500,000 scale representative point location digitized from the Barrington Atlas of the Greek and Roman World by the Digital Atlas of Roman and Medieval Civilizations project at Harvard University.
properties.title: DARMC location 15099
